name: 2048 Zodiac
description:
2048 Zodiac is a tiny puzzle game about numbered and imageable tiles.

Wipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same image touch, they merge into new one. Let's get ready for reaching the highest score with many interesting pictures about Zodiac!

**This game is optimized for iPhone 5(s), iPhone 6(s) Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus and iPhone X
